## AWSBuckets.createBucket() method

Create a new bucket

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createBucket(bucketName: string, options?: CreateBucketOptions): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  bucketName | string | Bucket name |
|  options | [CreateBucketOptions](./api-buckets.createbucketoptions.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Remarks

This operation is not atomic if the access is not private
